entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
